00011 #include <QHBoxLayout>

00018 
00019 ComponentTreeNavigator::ComponentTreeNavigator(QSharedPointer<Component> component, 
00020                                                                                            LibraryInterface* handler,
00021                                                                                            QWidget *parent): 
00022 QGroupBox(parent), 
00023 view_(handler, *component->getVlnv(), this), 
00024 model_(component, handler, this), 
00025 addButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/add.png"), QString(), this),
00026 removeButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/remove.png"), QString(), this) {
00027 
00028         // connect the model to the view
00029         view_.setModel(&model_);
00030         view_.expandToDepth(0);
00031 
00032         // the layout to manage the two buttons
00033         QVBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QVBoxLayout();
00034 
00035         // connect the add button
00036         connect(&addButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00037                 this, SLOT(onAdd()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00038         buttonLayout->addWidget(&addButton_);
00039 
00040         // connect the remove button
00041         connect(&removeButton_, SIGNAL(clicked()),
00042                 this, SLOT(onRemove()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00043         buttonLayout->addWidget(&removeButton_);
00044         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00045 
00046         // at start the buttons are disabled because nothing has been selected
00047         removeButton_.setDisabled(true);
00048         addButton_.setDisabled(true);
00049 
00050         // create the top layout that manages the view and the buttonLayout
00051         QHBoxLayout* topLayout = new QHBoxLayout(this);
00052 
00053         topLayout->addWidget(&view_);
00054         topLayout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00055 
00056         // connect the signal from the view that informs when user selects one item
00057         // in the view
00058         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(activated(const QModelIndex&)),
00059                 this, SLOT(onItemSelected(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00060         
00061         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(moveItem(const QModelIndex&, const QModelIndex&)),
00062                 &model_, SLOT(moveItem(const QModelIndex&, const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00063 
00064         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(itemMoved()),
00065                 this, SIGNAL(itemMoved()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00066 }
00067 
00068 ComponentTreeNavigator::~ComponentTreeNavigator() {
00069 
00070 }
00071 
00072 void ComponentTreeNavigator::onAdd() {
00073         
00074         // get currently selected index
00075         QModelIndex parentIndex = view_.currentIndex();
00076         if (!parentIndex.isValid()) {
00077                 return;
00078         }
00079 
00080         // create the child item and get it's model index
00081         QModelIndex childIndex = model_.createChild(parentIndex);
00082 
00083         // if the child was not created an invalid model index is returned
00084         if (!childIndex.isValid()) {
00085                 // return because nothing was created
00086                 return;
00087         }
00088 
00089         // select the recently created index
00090         view_.setCurrentIndex(childIndex);
00091 }
00092 
00093 void ComponentTreeNavigator::onRemove() {
00094 
00095         // get currently selected index
00096         QModelIndex index = view_.currentIndex();
00097         if (!index.isValid()) {
00098                 return;
00099         }
00100         
00101         // inform that all the editors for these items should be removed.
00102         emit itemRemoved(index);
00103 
00104         // tell model to remove the item.
00105         model_.removeItem(index);
00106 
00107         // deselect all items
00108         view_.setCurrentIndex(QModelIndex());
00109 }
00110 
00111 void ComponentTreeNavigator::updateItemName(const QString newName, const QModelIndex& index ) 
00112 {
00113         model_.setItemName(newName, index);
00114 }
00115 
00116 QSize ComponentTreeNavigator::sizeHint() const {
00117         return QSize(300, 600);
00118 }
00119 
00120 void ComponentTreeNavigator::updateItem( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00121         model_.updateItem(index);
00122 }
00123 
00124 void ComponentTreeNavigator::onItemSelected( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00125         
00126         if (!index.isValid()) {
00127                 return;
00128         }
00129 
00130         ComponentTreeItem* item = static_cast<ComponentTreeItem*>(
00131                 index.internalPointer());
00132 
00133         // if editor is locked then don't enabled state of buttons
00134         if (!locked_) {
00135                 // if the item can have children then enable the add button, otherwise 
00136                 // disable it. If item can be removed then enable remove button.
00137                 addButton_.setEnabled(item->canHaveChildren());
00138                 removeButton_.setEnabled(item->canBeRemoved());
00139         }
00140 
00141         // pass the info on item selection forward
00142         emit itemSelected(index);
00143 }
00144 
00145 void ComponentTreeNavigator::clearSelection() {
00146         /*view_.clearSelection();
00147         view_.setCurrentIndex(QModelIndex());*/
00148 }
00149 
00150 void ComponentTreeNavigator::setLocked( bool locked ) {
00151         locked_ = locked;
00152         addButton_.setDisabled(locked);
00153         removeButton_.setDisabled(locked);
00154         view_.setLocked(locked);
00155 }
00156 
00157 void ComponentTreeNavigator::selectItem( const QModelIndex& index ) {
00158         disconnect(&view_, SIGNAL(activated(const QModelIndex&)),
00159                 this, SLOT(onItemSelected(const QModelIndex&)));
00160         //view_.clearSelection();
00161         view_.selectItem(index);
00162         connect(&view_, SIGNAL(activated(const QModelIndex&)),
00163                 this, SLOT(onItemSelected(const QModelIndex&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00164 }
00165 
00166 QModelIndex ComponentTreeNavigator::generalEditorIndex() const {
00167         return model_.generalEditorIndex();
